Gui.1:
Simple search :

Write your keywords on the search bar ex: الحمد لله
Gui.2:
Search in specified sura :

add to your query "sura:" or "سورة:" ex: سورة:الفاتحة
Gui.3:
Different methods of sorting:

Go to options panel and change "order by" , there are many criteria : order by relevance, by the position of aya in the Mus-haf ,by the date of revelation ...
Gui.4:
Search by a phrase :

Write your keywords between double quotes ,ex : "الحمد لله"
Gui.5:
use logical relations between keywords :

use + to oblige a keyword ,ex : الصلاة + الزكاة
use - to eliminate a keyword ,ex : الصلاة - الزكاة
use | to search one of two keywords ,ex : الصلاة | الزكاة
Gui.6:
use jokers or regular expression :

asterisk * replace many letters ,ex : وال*
? replace one letter ,ex: ؟الله
Gui.7:
use Buckwalter transliteration (partially implemented) :

ex: rabi to search for رب
qawol to search for قول
Gui.8:
search by words of the same origin as a keyword :

use > to search by the infinitive of verbs and the lemma of nouns ,ex: >جاهد
use >> to search by the arabic root ,ex: >>جاهد
Gui.9:
search by vocalization :

for full vocalization,search in the field "aya_" or "آية_" ,ex: آية_:مِنْ
for partial vocalization,search in the field "aya_" or "آية_" using quotes ,ex: آية_:'المَلك'
Gui.10:
search by subject :

Go to features panel, Subjects tab
Ex: search ayas talking about Taloot, choose the chapter : التاريخ و القصص القرآني then the topic : قصة طالوت , choose Relation : "Replace" and Press "Add to search bar"
Gui.11:
Structural search :

Go to features panel, Structural search tab
Ex: for searching only on juz' 3amma, choose search_in : juz's ,from : 30 , to : 30 . then Relation : "(AND)" and Press "Add to search bar"
Gui.12:
Statistic search :

Go to features panel, Statistical search tab
Ex: for searching ayas with more then four names of Allah, choose number_of : Allah words , in : ayas ,from : 5 , to : 10 . then Relation : "Replace" and Press "Add to search bar"
Gui.13:
Search sajadat:

Go to features panel, Divers tab then choose "yes" for Sajdah
Gui.14:
Verify numeric miracles:

you can use alfanous to verify some numeric miracles of Quran
Ex: if you search >الدنيا you find 115 times
if you search >الآخرة (includes بالآخرة...) you find also 115 times
